customer_name: Piglet N Pals L L C
site_name: PIGLET N PALS L L C

citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:10 A.M. on
25-Jan-18.
Nobody answered the front door upon arrival at 10:10 A.M. A telephone call was then made to the licensee, and a
message was left on the voice mail stating the date, time, and purpose of the visit and to call back if the message
was received. Inspector waited from 10:10 A.M. to 10:50 A.M. without a return phone call.

narrative:
2.126(b)                    REPEAT
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:10 A.M. on
25-Jan-18.
Nobody answered the front door upon arrival at 10:10 A.M.  A telephone call was then made to the licensee, and a
message was left on the voice mail stating the date, time, and purpose of the visit and to call back if the message
was received.  Inspector waited from 10:10 A.M. to 10:50 A.M. without a return phone call.
